members.signatureBeforeChange: public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
diff: +	* Feature in GTK, GtkCheckButton and GtkRadioButton allocate
+	* only the minimum size necessary for its child. This causes the child
+	* alignment to fail. The fix is to set the child size to the size
